## FilepickerBuilderOptions.allowedExtensions property

Filter files by allowed extensions (default: all files).

**Signature:**

```typescript
allowedExtensions?: string[];
```

## Remarks

Provide an array of file extensions (e.g., `['.ts', '.js']`<!-- -->) to filter the file list. Directories are always shown regardless of this setting. Empty array or undefined means no filtering.

## Example


```typescript
allowedExtensions: ['.ts', '.tsx', '.js', '.jsx']
```
